title: Semicocycle discontinuities for substitutions and reverse-reading automata. (arXiv:2211.01843v1 [math.DS])
description: In this article we define the semigroup associated to a substitution. We use it to construct a minimal automaton which generates a substitution sequence u in reverse reading. We show, in the case where the substitution has a coincidence, that this automaton completely describes the semicocycle discontinuities of u.
dc:creator: Gandhar Joshi, Reem Yassawi
